pre_git_commit_message: feat: enhance AI prompt system for question generation and answer evaluation - Update prompt structure in app/api/taobai/[id]/bot/route.ts for better question generation - Modify answer evaluation logic in app/api/nopbai/route.ts for more accurate grading - Add detailed result processing in app/ketqua/page.tsx for comprehensive score calculation
fix: Fixed line ending warnings in memory-bank/activeContext.md, ui/final.css, and app/lambai/(UI)/editor/plugins/InitialContentPlugin.tsx

final_git_commit_message:
Refactor: Extract panel resizing logic to usePanelResizer hook

Extracted the state, refs, event handlers, and effect responsible for handling the draggable resizing of the left panel in `app/lambai/(UI)/lambai.tsx` into a new custom hook `app/lambai/(UI)/hooks/usePanelResizer.ts`.

Updated `lambai.tsx` to import and utilize the `usePanelResizer` hook, simplifying the component's logic.

This refactoring improves code organization and encapsulation without changing functionality. Memory Bank files (`activeContext.md`, `systemPatterns.md`, `progress.md`) have been updated accordingly.
pre_git_commit_message: chore: Add formatted copy of mathlive static CSS for analysis
